name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry Lee BINK, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry Lee BINK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: J. Richard Gray, Lancaster, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 504
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry Lee BINK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
J. Richard Gray, Lancaster, for appellant.
Charles A. Achey, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
